name: METAL GEAR SOLID: HD COLLECTION PS Vita
name_original: METAL GEAR SOLID: HD COLLECTION PS Vita
description: From acclaimed director, Hideo Kojima, Metal Gear Solid HD Collection for the PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system includes two legendary MGS titles - Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty and Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater. The HD Collection provides the epic gameplay of the MGS franchise with all-new features including intuitive PS Vita system controls and game-save/trophy sharing with the PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system.
